name: adonis-api-app
description: Adonisjs boilerplate for API server with pre-configured JWT

scripts.dev:server: nodemon -L --watch app --watch config --watch jobs --watch lib --watch start --watch .env -x sucrase-node server.js
scripts.dev:queue: nodemon -L --watch app --watch config --watch jobs --watch lib --watch start --watch .env -x sucrase-node queue.js
scripts.dev:bull_board: nodemon -L --watch app --watch config --watch jobs --watch lib --watch start --watch .env -x sucrase-node BullBoard.js
